on reading compounds: 褶襞【シュウヘキ】folds (e.g. on a mountain)
kun reading compounds: 襞【ひだ】fold, pleat, gathers, tuck, folds (e.g. of a mountain), crease, (hidden) detail, nuance, shade, wrinkle (e.g. in logic), lamella, gill (of a mushroom)
襞襟【ひだえり】ruff, ruffled collar, ruffed collar
山襞【やまひだ】folds of a mountain
